name: Poly Run
description:
A Game by Shamba Chowdhury

This is an Infinite Runner in the First Person Perspective.

This is a very early prototype.(v0.0.2)

This was made in 150 minutes. So expect massive bugs.

This was made for Leakforums Game Jam.

This will updated to a stable bug-free version very soon.

Report bugs in the comment Section.

Join our Discord server - https://discord.gg/X3yY8B

Controls - 

  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • Right Arrow - Turn right
  • Left Arrow - Turn Left

Untested feature(Only for Windows 10) - 

Speech control - 

  • Say "Up"  - Jump
  • Say "Right"  - Turn right
  • Say "Left"  - Turn Left

Thanks You
